trends: There has been one other sighting in Gaston
There were no other sightings in Gaston on or around November 6th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was near the house and playing when I saw it my grandpa told me that in area 51 they have ufos and when I saw it I just know it. I tried to call the cops but they never came. The ufo was moving very slow and going around and around I think it was looking for something but the last I saw it was when it stop at a house and I saw a person go fly up and I was scaryed because that was my friends dad. After that it just zoomed like so fast. I have Info on them and i know the goverments secrets on area 51 and all. One day I was face to face with a alien when I was 8.
Summary: Moving slow I think looking for something
